#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
string  str;
int t,c;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
     c=0;
cin>>str;
for(int i=0;i<str.size();i++)
{
if(str[i]=='a' || str[i]=='e' ||str[i]=='i' ||str[i]=='o' ||str[i]=='u' )
c++;
else if(str[i]=='A' || str[i]=='E' ||str[i]=='I' ||str[i]=='O' ||str[i]=='U' )
c++;
}
if(c==0)
cout<<"no"<<endl;
else
cout<<"yes"<<endl;
}
}
